raw_glosses: (printing) A printed matter produced with offset printing.

words.etymology_text: From offset + painate (“printed matter”) with the initial component from English offset.

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English ophthalmo-), ultimately from Ancient Greek ὀφθαλμός (ophthalmós).

forms.form: Rare. Only used with substantive adjectives.

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English ophthalmic), ultimately from Latin ophthalmicus and adapted with the adjectival suffix + -inen.

Internationalism (see English ophthalmotonometry). Contains the suffix -metria.
oftalmo- + -metria
